title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to my new website! I’ve rebuilt this site using Quarto — a modern open-source scientific publishing system. I’ll be using this blog to share updates on my research, teaching, and thoughts on spatial data science.
Stay tuned for more posts.

title: Teaching
text:
I contribute to GEOG0030, UCL’s undergraduate module on geocomputation and spatial analysis using R.

GEOG0030 Coursebook




A collection of R tutorials covering GIS topics including geocoding, network analysis, and greenspace accessibility.

R GIS Tutorials




A practical guide to using AI tools (including LLMs) for GIS and spatial analysis workflows.

GIS AI Manual

title: Research
text:
My research focuses on transport geography, urban mobility, and spatial data science. I am particularly interested in how spatial analysis and network methods can be applied to understand accessibility, travel behaviour, and urban systems.



Transport and accessibility modelling
Spatial data science and GIS methods
Network analysis of urban systems
Active travel and sustainable transport

title: Joanna Wilkin
text: I am a researcher and teaching fellow in the Department of Geography at University College London (UCL). My work focuses on transport geography, spatial data science, and GIS.
